  • Next Steps...

  • Nothing beats a face to face valuation report from an Estate Agent. They will take into account; changes made to your property, Extensions and curb appeal.
  • Estate agents don’t charge for face to face valuations, this is their opportunity to showcase how best they can sell your home. We recommend meeting at least 2 agents to compare fee’s and their local success rate.
